title: Textes of Scripture chayning the holy chronicle vntyll the sunne lost his lyght, and the Sonne brake the Serpentes head: dying, rising, and ascending.
author: Broughton, Hugh, 1549-1612.
publisher: [By Richard Watkins] for Gabriell Simson and W. White: and are to be solde at their house in Fleete lane,
notes: "To the Christian reader" signed: H.B., i.e. Hugh Broughton.
Reproduction of the original in the Library of Congress.
